channel.description:
hey guys ive played ritzscape so badly in 2009
now i downloaded a remake but the d claw specs arent as good that were on ritzscape
also i remmebered karil's bow was good but it aint good in the remake
but i cant remember evrything about it so if someone that played ritzscape and know how to make this combat like real ritzscape i will repp++ and u can be mod when i gona host oldschool ritzscpae :)
